channel.title: photo on Miro's World
channel.description: Recent content in photo on Miro's World

item.title: Smugmug "processing image" - follow up
item.description: In the previous article I have mentioned the potential issue with some uploaded images hanging in state "Processing image" for surprisingly long time after upload and expressed hope that there is some background "catch it all" process that would take care of all these. As it turned out, there is. All uploaded images that were haging in the processing stage turned up to be fixed by next day or so (it was about 10-20 images out of about 3-4 thousand).

item.title: First week with SmugMug
item.description: Week ago, my SmugMug 14 day trial period expired and (as expected) I signed up for the 1 year service. Here are my first impressions after over week of use, with over 3000 uploaded photos and 6.8 GB disc space consumed :-). Good news is - it really works as advertised and I still like it a lot. I have not really tried many of the features, but what I did try, worked as expected.
